name: Center of the Matrix
description:
Create a method that returns the center of a 2-dim array.

~~~if:ruby
It should return nil if there is no single center element.
~~~

~~~if:cpp
It should return `std::nullopt` if there is no single center element.
~~~

~~~if:java
It should return `null` if there is no single center element.
~~~

You can assume all inputs will be rectangular matricies in array form.
ex: `[[1, 2, 3], [4, 5, 6], [7, 8, 9]]`
